Use this template to share feedback on the proposed verification criteria updates due for October 2026. The full text of the proposed verification criteria can be found in: [[draft]-what-disclosures-we-accept.md](https://github.com/thegreenwebfoundation/verification-criteria/blob/main/%5Bdraft%5D-what-disclosures-we-accept.md).

Are you:
- [ ] An existing verified provider?
- [ ] A provider that might consider being verified in the future?
- [ ] A user of the Green Web Foundation's dataset (via the API or Green Web Check)?
- [ ] None of the above

## Feedback
_When providing feedback, please be sure to quote or link to the specific section of the proposed criteria for which your feedback refers._
